Description=Service for virtual machines hosted on VMware
Documentation=http://open-vm-tools.sourceforge.net/about.php
ConditionVirtualization=vmware

[Service]

RestartSec=7
StartLimitInterval=400

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
